sense.def:
To remove something from a place
pomeni tisto odstraniti z nekega kraja.

seg.quote: The servants came in to remove the cups.
He removed his hand from the man's collar.

sense.def:
To remove clothing
pomeni odstraniti oblačila s telesa.

seg.quote: Will you remove your shoes before you go in, please?

sense.def:
To remove a stain from something
pomeni madež namazati ali poškropiti s kemično snovjo ali ga oprati, zato da izgine.

To remove something undesirable
pomeni poskrbeti, da nekaj nezaželenega izgine.

seg.quote: Instant publication would have removed suspicion.
